repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing:
A blank guard leaf (U1).
The Tirukkuṟaḷ, text and commentary (Indien 56a).
The Paṇaviṭutūtu (Indien 56b).
A text not identified on Nīti (Indien 56c).
A blank guard leaf (U2).
Description by Eva Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Original manuscript examined by Emmanuel Francis (October 2022).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark sticker on recto.
1 bifolio = guard leaf (additional). No foliation. Blank recto verso, except for 3 long piḷḷaiyār cuḻis on the recto. Shelfmarks on recto. 360 x 30 mm.
1 bifolio = back guard leaf (additional). No foliation. Blank recto verso. Shelfmark on recto. 360 x 30 mm.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. Some boreholes and truncation.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 56 (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark in white chalk: 901 (front cover, verso and back cover, recto).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 370 x 30 mm.

origin.origDate: Bundle not dated by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 12, no. 56.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 19r, no. 56.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Record created by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, July 2022.
Revised and enlarged by Emmanuel FRANCIS after examination of the original manuscript. Version 2, October 2022.
